venue.name: Wild Rover Bar Boston - 1 Block from Faneuil Hall

item.description:
Join the ladies of the Smiling Stiletto Shoe Club for their first cocktail party of 2013! Break out your sexy boots and kick it up at The Wild Rover bar (conveniently located next to Faneuil Hall- 1 block from State Street). We will have the entire second floor to ourselves. Mingle with other shoe loving fashionistas and enjoy plentiful complimentary appetizers including:

  • Pasta
  • Sicilian pizza
  • Chicken tenders
  • Quesadillas

Ankle boots, tall boots, really tall boots- we are looking forward to seeing some amazing boots strutting down the pink carpet and competing for prizes during the Best-in-Shoe walk-off competition! As always- you can still attend even if you don't have boots!

Â 

Smiling Stiletto Shoe Club is a free social organization for shoe and fashion lovers with over 2,700 members in the greater Boston area! They get together monthly for cocktail parties, shopping events and fashion shows. Check it out at:
http://www.smilingstiletto.com/
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Catherine (see photo) upstairs. If you have trouble finding us, call 774 232 0000
item.name: Ladies Night: Cocktail Party at Wild Rover
